messages.subject: HEM's unschooling lists
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yes. 26 of them at last count. But if you re looking for a list with the word unschooling specifically in the name, here s our only one:
messages.messageBody:
At 10:29 AM -0500 6/4/04, Nichole in Round Rock wrote:
>Curious, does HEM own any unschooling lists anymore?

Yes. 26 of them at last count.

But if you're looking for a list with the word 'unschooling'
specifically in the name, here's our only one:
http://www.groups.yahoo.com/group/HEM-Unschooling

If you'd like a complete listing just send me a note with "HEM Lists"
in the subject header and my autoresponder will send the information.
No, I don't collect email addresses via this process. I just share
the HEM lists info. ;-)

Helen

messages.subject: Hi--I made it, finally....
messages.msgSnippet: This should serve as an introduction, I suppose. I m Nichole, unschooling mama to Margaux ( 7 next Wednesday ).  I m here because suddenly Unschooling 101
messages.messageBody:
This should serve as an introduction, I suppose.

I'm Nichole, unschooling mama to Margaux ( 7 next Wednesday ). I'm here because suddenly Unschooling 101 became HEM New Homeschoolers while I was away at the Rethinking Education Conference over the weekend.

Dana, thanks for letting me know about this one.

Curious, does HEM own any unschooling lists anymore?

:o)
Nichole
